LanguageData.BSZA_ReturnChanceColonist: Additional return chance for colonists (can trigger if the above fail)
LanguageData.BSZA_BerserkLoseFaction: Chance that rehabilitation will be needed if returned berserk/manhunter.
LanguageData.BSZA_BerserkLoseFactionApoc: Chance that rehabilitation will be needed if returned berserk/manhunter chance (Unliving Nightmare)
LanguageData.BSZA_BerserkPermanent: Chance that the manhunter state is permanent
LanguageData.BSZA_BerserkPermanentApoc: Chance that the manhunter state is permanent (Unliving Nightmare)
